title: My Beloved Mr. Mu - Novel Updates
tags: Boss-Subordinate Relationship   Co-Workers   Cold Love Interests   Cute Protagonist   Devoted Love Interests   Doting Love Interests   Enemies Become Lovers   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Modern Day   Popular Love Interests   Wealthy Characters
author: Gu Xiao
description:
Before their marriage, Mr. Mu was a cold, handsome, and wealthy big boss. A lot of young girls fell for him. But, he only had his eyes on his little assistant. He was cold and harsh toward her. 

The little assistant was pitiful. “Big boss, please be gentle.” 

The wicked big boss smiled wickedly, “Marry me and I’ll give you the kind of gentleness specially for you.” 

>
